name: Revizzit
tag_list: epublishing, ecommerce, drm, online-marketing, content-marketing, distribution, ebooks, anti-piracy
overview:
Revizzit is a complete publishing and distribution platform for securely delivering premium, exclusive digital content.

The Revizzit system is comprised of two interconnected components - Revizzit Studio, a web-based content creation, monetization and management SaaS, and the Revizzit Player, a free distributable content player that allows authorized consumers to view and interact with any kind of digital media.

Among Revizzit’s unique features are the abilities to instantly update, modify or add content to products, deactivate products in the event of refunds or cancellations, protect content with anti-piracy digital fingerprinting, schedule content delivery (drip content), limit access to products with whitelist and blacklist options, and more.
